name: Woo-Divi
author: CodePixelzMedia, Bishal Basnet

sections.description: This is an extension for the Divi Builder. You would require Divi Builder and WooCommerce to be present. This will add a button to the Divi Builder similar to Call to Action button and let’s you add an Add to Cart button anywhere in a page for Simple Product. The support for Variable product is not yet present and will be added later.
sections.installation:
1. Upload woodivi.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. A new divi module will be added with name WooCommerce Product
sections.changelog:
1.0.0 – First Major release
1.1.0 – Added field for redirect on Divi Module Editor
